values:
Pastor Jeffery talks with our very own Deacon Nate Douglas about how to approach the polling day for the coming presidential election. They discuss why politics matters; how (and how much) it matters; the moral imperatives that arise from the dangers of economic and political dysfunction; voting options; write-in candidates; reasons for our voting choices; [â€¦]

The post Approaching Polling Day | Nate Douglas appeared first on .
